img.div:
Headbands for Health Care Workers
Katie Corcoran, a fourth grade student from Kramer Lane Elementary School, has been sewing buttons onto headbands for health care workers, which... (more) Headbands for Health Care Workers Slideshow Caption

img.div:
CBS Students Explore Nature
Second grade students from Central Boulevard Elementary School in the Bethpage School District created nature journals based on the educational video... (more) CBS Students Explore Nature Slideshow Caption

img.div:
BHS Senior Appointed to Service Academies
Alexandra Midgette, a senior at Bethpage High School, received appointments to three of the United States service academies: the Military Academy at... (more) BHS Senior Appointed to Service Academies Slideshow Caption

img.alt: Bethpage Receives National Recognition
img.title: Bethpage Receives National Recognition
img.div:
Bethpage Receives National Recognition
The Bethpage School District has been honored with the Best Communities for Music Education designation from the NAMM Foundation for its outstanding... (more) Bethpage Receives National Recognition Slideshow Caption

img.alt: Long Island Ethics Bowl
img.title: Long Island Ethics Bowl
img.div:
Long Island Ethics Bowl
The 11th Annual Long Island Ethics Bowl took place at Hofstra University where teams were presented with a series of wide-ranging ethical dilemmas... (more) Long Island Ethics Bowl Slideshow Caption

img.alt: French Class Voyage to Quebec
img.title: French Class Voyage to Quebec
img.div:
French Class Voyage to Quebec
Students in John F. Kennedy Middle School's French 7 and 8 classes visited Quebec with Ms. Jaklitsch, Ms. Costello, Ms. Villanueva, and Mr. Choi.... (more) French Class Voyage to Quebec Slideshow Caption

img.alt: Exchanging Kindness for Books at CCS
img.title: Exchanging Kindness for Books at CCS
img.div:
Exchanging Kindness for Books at CCS
A book vending machine was unveiled at Charles Campagne Elementary School to celebrate Pick a Reading Partner month on March 3.
Students will... (more) Exchanging Kindness for Books at CCS Slideshow Caption

img.alt: Third Annual Regal Eagle Rampage
img.title: Third Annual Regal Eagle Rampage
img.div:
Third Annual Regal Eagle Rampage
The Bethpage High School Robotics team held the third annual Regal Eagle Rampage on March 1, 2020. High school robotics teams are invited to... (more) Third Annual Regal Eagle Rampage Slideshow Caption
